TopicTitle: how i do post a screenshot

Articles.Content: i dont know how i do this this happends

This file is on your computer, not online. The forums can't directly access files on your computer.

You're going to have to put the image on line somewhere (most people here use imgur as a site to upload pictures.), then put the URL to the picture between your brackets.

I also like to use a little program called puush, which allows you to take screenshots or shots of part of your screen and will automatically upload them online and give you a link to them.
